message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000.  I believe this is a fair price, considering the value it holds for you.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900000 doesn't quite meet my expectations.  Considering the substantial value this product holds for you, I'm willing to come down to $1000000.  This price still allows for a good profit margin for me, while also making this a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
